name: Requirement of Supervisor (PST) for DMRC O&M work of Mumbai Metro Line-3

eligibility.education: Three years regular Engineering Diploma in Electrical from a Govt. recognized University/Institute
eligibility.experience: Experience in construction/maintenance of 25 kV Flexible/Rigid OHE or 25 kV AC Traction Substation

contact_details.address: Executive Director (HR), Delhi Metro Rail Corporation Ltd., Metro Bhawan, Fire Brigade Lane, Barakhamba Road, New Delhi
